attributes.action: Mobile Industry to open their data networks to the DEAF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mobile Phone Tariffs for Deaf Users should be a basic right but not one company offers a tariff without us having to pay for thousands of DEAF TALK TIME WE CANNOT EVER USE

 I have for 20 years now put up with buying into phone plans that supply 1,000 of free talk time to attract customers and have for years paid punitive rates for SMS messages.
